recommendations: Acetaminophen: 325-1000mg every 4-6 hours as needed for pain and fever.
Ibuprofen: 200-400mg every 4-6 hours as needed for pain and fever.
avoid: Avoid strenuous activities until symptoms improve
Avoid contact with others to prevent spreading the infection
follow_up: If symptoms persist for more than a week or worsen significantly, consult a healthcare provider.
